title: 669 Boulevard NE #1
description: This 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is located in the Old Fourth Ward neighborhood of Atlanta. It has a total size of 1,150 sqft. Some features of this property include A/C cooling, on-site parking, and outdoor space. Utilities are included. Pets are not allowed.
